type.text: Any benefit payable will be paid to the provider (Assignment of Benefit).

category.text: The total submitted amount for the claim or group or line item.
Amount of the change which is considered for adjudication.
Amount deducted from the eligible amount prior to adjudication.
The amount the insured individual pays, as a set percentage of the cost of covered medical services, as an out-of-pocket payment to the provider.
Patient Co-Payment
The portion of the cost of this service that was deemed not eligible by the insurer because the service or member was not covered by the subscriber contract.
Amount payable under the coverage
The amount paid by the patient at the point of service.
The amount of the discount
Denial Reason
Indicates the claim or claim line was paid out of network. This does not indicate the contracting status of the provider
The total submitted amount for the claim or group or line item.
Amount of the change which is considered for adjudication.
Amount deducted from the eligible amount prior to adjudication.
Patient Co-Payment
The portion of the cost of this service that was deemed not eligible by the insurer because the service or member was not covered by the subscriber contract.
Amount payable under the coverage
The amount paid by the patient at the point of service.
Indicates the claim or claim line was paid out of network. This does not indicate the contracting status of the provider
